verses.verse: Am <WG1510> <WG5748> I not <WG3756> an emissary <WG652>? am <WG1510> <WG5748> I not <WG3756> free <WG1658>? have I not <WG3780> seen <WG3708> <WG5758> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962>? are <WG2075> <WG5748> not <WG3756> ye <WG5210> my <WG3450> work <WG2041> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>?

If <WG1487> I be <WG1510> <WG5748> not <WG3756> an emissary <WG652> unto others <WG243>, yet <WG235> doubtless <WG1065> I am <WG1510> <WG5748> to you <WG5213>: for <WG1063> the seal <WG4973> of mine <WG1699> emissaryship <WG651> are <WG2075> <WG5748> ye <WG5210> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>.

Have we <WG2192> <WG5719> not <WG3378> power <WG1849> to eat <WG5315> <WG5629> and <WG2532> to drink <WG4095> <WG5629>?

Have we <WG2192> <WG5719> not <WG3378> power <WG1849> to lead about <WG4013> <WG5721> a sister <WG79>, a wife <WG1135>, as well as <WG5613> <WG2532> other <WG3062> emissarys <WG652>, and <WG2532> as the brethren <WG80> of the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> Kefa <WG2786>?

Who <WG5101> goeth a warfare <WG4754> <WG5731> any time at <WG4218> his own <WG2398> charges <WG3800>? who <WG5101> planteth <WG5452> <WG5719> a vineyard <WG290>, and <WG2532> eateth <WG2068> <WG5719> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> the fruit <WG2590> thereof <WG846>? or <WG2228> who <WG5101> feedeth <WG4165> <WG5719> a flock <WG4167>, and <WG2532> eateth <WG2068> <WG5719> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> the milk <WG1051> of the flock <WG4167>?
Say I <WG2980> <WG5719> these things <WG5023> as <WG3361> <WG2596> a man <WG444>? or <WG2228> saith <WG3004> <WG5719> not <WG3780> the Torah <WG3551> the same <WG5023> also <WG2532>?

For <WG1063> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769> in <WG1722> the Torah <WG3551> of Mosheh <WG3475>, Thou shalt <WG5392> not <WG3756> muzzle <WG5392> <WG5692> the mouth of the ox <WG1016> that treadeth out the corn <WG248> <WG5723>. <WG3361> Doth <WG3199> 'Elohim <WG2316> take care <WG3199> <WG5719> for oxen <WG1016>?

Or <WG2228> saith he <WG3004> <WG5719> it altogether <WG3843> for <WG1223> our <WG2248> sakes <WG1223>? For <WG1223> our <WG2248> sakes <WG1223>, no doubt <WG1063>, this is written <WG1125> <WG5648>: that <WG3754> he that ploweth <WG722> <WG5723> should <WG3784> <WG5719> plow <WG722> <WG5721> in <WG1909> hope <WG1680>; and <WG2532> that he that thresheth <WG248> <WG5723> in hope <WG1680> should be partaker <WG3348> <WG5721> of <WG1909> his <WG846> hope <WG1680>.

If <WG1487> we <WG2249> have sown <WG4687> <WG5656> unto you <WG5213> spiritual things <WG4152>, is it a great thing <WG3173> if <WG1487> we <WG2249> shall reap <WG2325> <WG5692> your <WG5216> carnal things <WG4559>?

If <WG1487> others <WG243> be partakers <WG3348> <WG5719> of this power <WG1849> over you <WG5216>, are not <WG3756> we <WG2249> rather <WG3123>? Nevertheless <WG235> we have <WG5530> not <WG3756> used <WG5530> <WG5662> this <WG5026> power <WG1849>; but <WG235> suffer <WG4722> <WG5719> all things <WG3956>, lest <WG3363> we should <WG1325> <WG5632> <WG5100> hinder <WG1464> the gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547>.

Do ye <WG1492> not <WG3756> know <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> they which minister <WG2038> <WG5740> about holy things <WG2413> live <WG2068> <WG5719> of the things of <WG1537> the temple <WG2411>? and they which wait <WG4332> <WG5723> at the altar <WG2379> are partakers <WG4829> <WG5736> with the altar <WG2379>?

Havahn <WG2532> so <WG3779> hath <WG1299> the YY <WG2962> ordained <WG1299> <WG5656> that they which preach <WG2605> <WG5723> the gospel <WG2098> should live <WG2198> <WG5721> of <WG1537> the gospel <WG2098>.

But <WG1161> I <WG1473> have used <WG5530> <WG5662> none <WG3762> of these things <WG5130>: <WG1161> neither <WG3756> have I written <WG1125> <WG5656> these things <WG5023>, that <WG2443> it should be <WG1096> so <WG3779> done <WG1096> <WG5638> unto <WG1722> me <WG1698>: for <WG1063> it were better <WG3123> for me <WG3427> to die <WG599> <WG5629> <WG2570>, than <WG2228> that <WG2443> any man <WG5100> should make <WG2758> my <WG3450> glorying <WG2745> void <WG2758> <WG5661>.

For <WG1063> though <WG1437> I preach the gospel <WG2097> <WG5735>, I <WG3427> have <WG2076> <WG5748> nothing <WG3756> to glory of <WG2745>: for <WG1063> necessity <WG318> is laid upon <WG1945> <WG5736> me <WG3427>; yea <WG1161>, woe <WG3759> is <WG2076> <WG5748> unto me <WG3427>, if <WG3362> I preach <WG2097> not <WG3362> the gospel <WG2097> <WG5735>!

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> I do <WG4238> <WG5719> this thing <WG5124> willingly <WG1635>, I have <WG2192> <WG5719> a reward <WG3408>: but <WG1161> if <WG1487> against my will <WG210>, a dispensation <WG3622> of the gospel is committed unto me <WG4100> <WG5769>.

What <WG5101> is <WG2076> <WG5748> my <WG3427> reward <WG3408> then <WG3767>? Verily that <WG2443>, when I preach the gospel <WG2097> <WG5734>, I may make <WG5087> <WG5661> the gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547> without charge <WG77>, that <WG1519> I abuse <WG2710> <WG5664> not <WG3361> my <WG3450> power <WG1849> in <WG1722> the gospel <WG2098>.

For <WG1063> though I be <WG5607> <WG5752> free <WG1658> from <WG1537> all <WG3956> men, yet have I made <WG1402> myself <WG1683> servant <WG1402> <WG5656> unto all <WG3956>, that <WG2443> I might gain <WG2770> <WG5661> the more <WG4119>.

And <WG2532> unto the Jews <WG2453> I became <WG1096> <WG5633> as <WG5613> a Jew <WG2453>, that <WG2443> I might gain <WG2770> <WG5661> the Jews <WG2453>; to them that are under <WG5259> the Torah <WG3551>, as <WG5613> under <WG5259> the Torah <WG3551>, that <WG2443> I might gain <WG2770> <WG5661> them that are under <WG5259> the Torah <WG3551>;

To them that are without Torah <WG459>, as <WG5613> without Torah <WG459>, (being <WG5607> <WG5752> not <WG3361> without Torah <WG459> to 'Elohim <WG2316>, but <WG235> under the Torah <WG1772> to Moshiach <WG5547>,) that <WG2443> I might gain <WG2770> <WG5661> them that are without Torah <WG459>.

To the weak <WG772> became I <WG1096> <WG5633> as <WG5613> weak <WG772>, that <WG2443> I might gain <WG2770> <WG5661> the weak <WG772>: I am made <WG1096> <WG5754> all things <WG3956> to all <WG3956> men, that <WG2443> I might <WG4982> by all means <WG3843> save <WG4982> <WG5661> some <WG5100>.
And <WG1161> this <WG5124> I do <WG4160> <WG5719> for <WG1223> the gospel's <WG2098> sake <WG1223>, that <WG2443> I might be <WG1096> <WG5638> partaker <WG4791> thereof <WG846> with <WG4791> you.

Know ye <WG1492> <WG5758> not <WG3756> that <WG3754> they which run <WG5143> <WG5723> in <WG1722> a race <WG4712> run <WG5143> <WG5719> all <WG3956> <WG3303>, but <WG1161> one <WG1520> receiveth <WG2983> <WG5719> the prize <WG1017>? So <WG3779> run <WG5143> <WG5720>, that <WG2443> ye may obtain <WG2638> <WG5632>.

And <WG1161> every man <WG3956> that striveth for the mastery <WG75> <WG5740> is temperate <WG1467> <WG5736> in all things <WG3956>. <WG3303> Now <WG3767> they <WG1565> do it to <WG2443> obtain <WG2983> <WG5632> a corruptible <WG5349> crown <WG4735>; but <WG1161> we <WG2249> an incorruptible <WG862>.

I <WG1473> therefore <WG5106> so <WG3779> run <WG5143> <WG5719>, not <WG3756> as <WG5613> uncertainly <WG84>; so <WG3779> fight I <WG4438> <WG5719>, not <WG3756> as <WG5613> one that beateth <WG1194> <WG5723> the air <WG109>:
